resources.string:
Auto report a blocked number to all API endpoints on incoming calls.

There is a one-hour time buffer before a number is reported. If the number repeats or has been dialed back within this time buffer, it\'s considered non-spam and will not be reported.

Only numbers blocked by these types will be reported:
- Non-Contact(contacts exclusive mode)
- STIR Attestation
- Number Regex - SMS Content Regex

Numbers blocked by following types will not be reported:
- Instant Query, preventing the API endpoint\'s number from being leaked to their competitors.
- Spam Database, they are likely to have been imported from API endpoints.
- Contact Regex, Contact Group Regex
- Meeting Mode
- Global testing

Passed numbers will not be reported.
To prevent misreporting of repeated calls or dialed-back numbers, reporting number requires call log permission.
